channel.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
channel.description:
Getting some error when I run_server...
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/1221/70145448.png[/img]
It was all working completely fine at one stage, then I changed the name of a Adventurer teleport and then changed some npc locs and added a few bankers... Yes I've compiled & compressed...
I can't see the top of the error because it scrolls too fast and automatically closes. Was lucky to get a screenshot of this.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
item.dc:creator: @pklobbys pklobbys

where can you get the rscd v25 client from this source?

item.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
item.dc:creator: @Equilibrium1 Equilibrium1
item.description:
@Equilibrium1 wrote:

I found out the problem, it was because I added four bankers in Npcloc.xml.

As soon as I got rid of them, It worked.

But now… Because I changed the location of Hovrik the Armourer, Lowe, Shop Keepers etc, when I try to talk to one of them, it won’t let me. I don’t see why, because all I did was change their location, how would that effect whether you can talk to the npc or not?

Or is there something else I need to change as well?

Read full topic

item.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

If the window closes to quickly then run from the command prompt found at:

Start -
All programs -
Accessories -
Command Prompt.

When you open it type the address of your run_server for example:

cd c:\Users\YOURNAME\Desktop\Easyrsc\Server\run

The “cd” at the begining tells the computer to change the current dir to the one you type in.

This windows will not close unless told to so you can find the first error - then you can see what is happening and post the full error on here if you need to.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
item.dc:creator: @6_ox 6 ox
item.description:
@6_ox wrote:

Im acually getting the same error message, im running windows Vista all i changed was the " LocalHost" To my IP Address. Then compiled the data and then it gave me that auto -error and closed. I dont know what is causing this.

Read full topic

item.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

When you changed the name of your npc, you porbally didn’t change it in NPCHandler.xml in the conf folder. Thats probally whats causing your error.

Read full topic

item.title: Run_server Problem (RSCD)
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

Here’s what you’d want to do, go to your ant folder and then bin (ant\bin) then right click on ant.bat, scroll down to the end and add a pause, this will prevent the window from closing automaticlly, when you’ve done this c&p everything and post it here.

Read full topic
